Hello, may I see the menu?
Sure! Here is the menu. Feel free to order whenever you're ready.
Okay, let's add 2 Strawberry Milk shake.
Alright, 2 Strawberry Milk shake have been successfully added to your cart. Would you like to add anything else?
I just want to add Fresh Limes.
Got it! Fresh Limes has also been added. Anything else?
Okay then, add Ginger Limes too.
Sure. Items in your cart now are: Strawberry Milk shakes, 1 Fresh Limes and Ginger Limes. The total will be calculated at checkout. Are you ready to proceed?
Yes, let's add all to the cart.

Hello
Hello! How can I help you?
May I see the menu?

Sure! Here is the menu.
    - Vennila - 75 RS  - Strawberry - 75 RS  - Chocolate - 80 RS  - Butter Scotch - 80 RS  - Pista - 80 RS  - Semam - 80 RS  - Badam Shake - 100 RS  - Oreo Shake - 80 RS  - Cara Milk Nuts - 80 RS  - Til Tak - 80 RS  - Looda - 20 RS  - Royal Falooda - 150 RS  - Pista Falooda - 160 RS  - Butter Falooda - 170 RS  - MGS Special Falooda - 210 RS  - Fresh Limes - 35 RS  - Ginger Limes - 25 RS  - Mint Limes - 35 RS  - Soda Limes - 25 RS   Feel free to order whenever you're ready.
I would like to order Vennila Milk Shake. What's the price of that?
The Vennila Milk Shake is priced at 75 RS. Would you like to order? Shall I add it to your cart?
Sure, I would like that. Yes, add to cart.
Yeah, it's added to the cart! Would you like anything else?
Yeah, I want one Strawberry Milkshake and Pista Ice Cream.
Sure! Strawberry Milkshake and Pista Ice Cream were added to the cart.Your cart contains Vennila Milk Shake - 75, Strawberry Milkshake - 75, and Pista Ice Cream - 80. Would you like anything else?
Yeah, add one Looda Falooda. I would like one.
Yeah, great choice! One Looda Falooda was added to the cart! Anything more, sir?
Okay, what are the drink options you have?
We have the Limes category items: Fresh Limes, Ginger Limes, Mint Limes, and Soda Limes. What would you like to order?
Yeah, I would like one Fresh Lime. That's it.
Yeah, the Fresh Lime was added to the cart. Would you like any more, sir?
That's it.

Yeah, sir, your cart contains Vennila Milk Shake - 75 RS, Strawberry Milkshake - 75 RS, Pista Ice Cream - 80 RS, and Fresh Lime - 35 RS. Would you like to check out?

```json
[
  { "item_name": "Vennila Milk Shake", "quantity": 1, "price": 75 },
  { "item_name": "Strawberry Milkshake", "quantity": 1, "price": 75 },
  { "item_name": "Pista Ice Cream", "quantity": 1, "price": 80 },
  { "item_name": "Fresh Lime", "quantity": 1, "price": 35 }
]
```
Yeah. Yes
Which payment method would you like to use? We have Cash on Delivery, Online Payment, UPI Payment, Card Payment, and Wallet Payment options.
I have UPI payment. I'll do that.
Yeah, sir, here is the method you can use to pay. Thank you! Have a happy meal!
